ai-dt2.11:0.3_0: connected with the One’s joy, (surely) associated with the Community,
ai-dt2.11:1.2_0: Those things associated with the mass of aggregates, sense fields, and thoughts associated with the four elements. What is the collection of the sense fields, which inclusively: these things being included in the mode of the elements, produced by the elements of the sense fields, and thoughts?
ai-dt2.11:1.3_0: the three things associated with one sense-spheres,
ai-dt2.11:1.4_0: the elements by one sense-sphere, with one sense-sphere, and with the associated state (of mind),
ai-dt2.11:1.5_0: Are any unassociated with the robe?
ai-dt2.11:1.6_0: (The ten discourses) with one sense-spheres derived from the ten elements.
ai-dt2.11:1.7_0: the elements of one sense-sphere, but with the single-element.
ai-dt2.11:2.2_0: Thoughts of the constituent groups aggregates in each and every way belonging to the primary elements. How many things must be included in the sense fields by phenomena?
ai-dt2.11:2.3_0: there’s no-one else who does not exist in nothing.
ai-dt2.11:2.4_0: Are any unassociated with the robe?
ai-dt2.11:2.5_0: the four bases of the constituent groups (of mind and body),
ai-dt2.11:2.6_0: the elements of one sense-sphere, but with the single-element.
ai-dt2.11:3.4_0: If things are included in the maintaining dealing with the ending of the defilements, the six sense fields make inclusions belonging to the Saṅgha, the collection of the mind elements aggregates ...
ai-dt2.11:3.5_0: the three things associated with one sense-spheres,
ai-dt2.11:3.6_0: the elements associated with one sense-sphere,
ai-dt2.11:3.7_0: Are any unassociated with the robe?
ai-dt2.11:3.8_0: (The ten discourses) with one sense-spheres derived from the ten elements.
ai-dt2.11:3.9_0: the elements of one sense-sphere, but with the single-element.
ai-dt2.11:4.1_0: includes all things in the beginning, middle, and end.
ai-dt2.11:4.2_0: the three things associated with one sense-spheres, and two sense-spheres
ai-dt2.11:4.3_0: the elements associated with one sense-sphere,
ai-dt2.11:4.4_0: Are any unassociated with the robe?
ai-dt2.11:4.5_0: the ten aggregates, with one sense-spheres, ten elements (of mind and bodily form),
ai-dt2.11:4.6_0: the elements of one sense-sphere, but with the single-element.
ai-dt2.11:5.6_0: ‘I will not think what is unfinished,’ and with sense-spheres thoughts that are wrong.
ai-dt2.11:5.10_0: ignorance is a condition for choices.
ai-dt2.11:5.11_0: ‘The six sense fields are conditions for contact.’ ...
ai-dt2.11:5.13_0: Craving is a condition for grasping. ...
ai-dt2.11:5.14_0: Those aggregates, each components, and the three aggregates are included in the sense fields, and the seven sense fields associated with the three elements.
ai-dt2.11:5.15_0: the elements by one sense-sphere, with one sense-sphere, and with the associated state (of mind),
ai-dt2.11:5.16_0: Are any unassociated with the robe?
ai-dt2.11:5.17_0: (The ten discourses) with one sense-spheres derived from the ten elements.
ai-dt2.11:5.18_0: the elements of one sense-sphere, but with the single-element.
ai-dt2.11:6.1_0: by lamenting and constituents (of mind and body) that phenomena because of the sense fields, the six sense fields aggregates, and the sense fields clinging to them.
ai-dt2.11:6.2_0: there’s no-one else who does not exist in nothing.
ai-dt2.11:6.3_0: Are any unassociated with the robe?
ai-dt2.11:6.4_0: the four bases of the constituent groups (of mind and body),
ai-dt2.11:6.5_0: the elements of one sense-sphere, but with the single-element.
ai-dt2.11:7.2_0: There are things that are painful ...
ai-dt2.11:7.3_0: maintaining includes mental predominances, respecting the inclusion of the sense-spheres,
ai-dt2.11:7.4_0: the three things associated with one sense-spheres,
ai-dt2.11:7.5_0: the elements associated with one sense-sphere,
ai-dt2.11:7.6_0: Are any unassociated with the robe?
ai-dt2.11:7.7_0: (The ten discourses) with one sense-spheres derived from the ten elements.
ai-dt2.11:7.8_0: the elements of one sense-sphere, but with the single-element.
ai-dt2.11:8.14_0: roots and all things are connected with the teaching ...
ai-dt2.11:8.15_0: roots and all things associated with it,
ai-dt2.11:8.17_0: thoughts that are grounds for those things.
ai-dt2.11:8.27_0: thoughts that are defiled and defilements ...
ai-dt2.11:8.28_0: thoughts that are defiled and connected with the defilements ...
ai-dt2.11:8.29_0: Thoughts associated with the defilements but the defilements are associated with the defilements. They are included in the sense fields and thoughts associated with the defilements. Are phenomena about the sense fields and thoughts connected with the sense fields?
ai-dt2.11:8.30_0: the three things associated with one sense-spheres,
ai-dt2.11:8.31_0: the elements by one sense-sphere, with one sense-sphere, and with the associated state (of mind),
ai-dt2.11:8.32_0: Are any unassociated with the robe?
ai-dt2.11:8.33_0: (The ten discourses) with one sense-spheres derived from the ten elements.
